comments:
Version: 3.2.0
Build id: I20051213-0010

Create new java project
Create new class E1
Rename E1.java to E1.foobar in navigator
window->preferences->general->Content Types
   Add file association *.foobar to Java Source Files
Restart Eclipse
remove *.foobar from file associations again
double click E1.foobar in package explorer:

org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.Assert$AssertionFailedException: Assertion failed; The source type has an invalid name: E1.foobar
